    (function(w,i,o){

   <script>
    (function(w){
 w._sf_async_config = w._sf_async_config || {};
 w.testingActive = true;
 _sf_async_config.uid = 33715;
 _sf_async_config.useCanonical = true;
 _sf_async_config.domain = w.location.hostname;
 w._sf_startpt = (new Date()).getTime();
 var data = {
 'category': 'chartbeat',
 'name':'headlineTesting',
 'value': 'true'
 };
 function fireEvent(el, evt, data){
 var event;
 data = data || {};
 if(document.createEvent) {
 event = document.createEvent("HTMLEvents");
 event.initEvent(evt, true, true);
 event.data = data;
 el.dispatchEvent(event);
 } else if (document.createEventObject){
 event = document.createEventObject();
 event.data = data;
 el.fireEvent('on'+evt,event);
 }
 el.dataEvents = el.dataEvents || {};
 el.dataEvents[evt] = el.dataEvents[evt] || [];
 el.dataEvents[evt].push(data);
 }
 fireEvent(w, 'analytics.track', data);
 })(window);
   </script>

          </li>
          <li>
           <a data-link-tracking="Header|DropDown|Text|Food &amp;amp; Drink" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/food-drink/">
            Food &amp; Drink
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a data-link-tracking="Header|DropDown|Text|Family &amp;amp; Kids" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/family-kids/">
            Family &amp; Kids
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a data-link-tracking="Header|DropDown|Text|Film" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/film/">
            Film
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a data-link-tracking="Header|DropDown|Text|Music &amp;amp; Nightlife" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/">
            Music &amp; Nightlife
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a data-link-tracking="Header|DropDown|Text|Shopping" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/shopping/">
            Shopping
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
         <a class="icon toggle" href="#">
          Expand
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a data-link-tracking="Header|SectionLabel|Text|Scunthorpe" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe">
          Scunthorpe
         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </section>
     </nav>
     <div data-immediate="data-immediate" data-mod="signin" id="signin">
      <span class="label">
       <span class="icon">

   <main class="mod-pancakes">
    <nav class="breadcrumbs breadcrumbs-topic" xmlns:vocabulary="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#">
     <ol>
      <li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb">
       <a class="publication-theme-highlight publication-theme-icon" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/" property="vocabulary:title" rel="vocabulary:url">
        frontpage
       </a>
      </li>
      <li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/in-your-area/" property="vocabulary:title" rel="vocabulary:url">
        In Your Area
       </a>
      </li>
     </ol>
    </nav>
    <div class="topic-head channel-topic">
     <h1>
      Scunthorpe Live
     </h1>
     <div class="topic-intro">
      <figure class="mod-image" data-mod="image">
       <div class="image-outer">
        <img alttext="" data-height="198" data-src="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/in-your-area/article1591239.ece/ALTERNATES/s298/scuntthorpeLive298x198.jpg" data-width="298"/>
       </div>
      </figure>
      <div class="topic-intro-text">
       <p class="hidden">
       </p>
       <div class="topic-more-on">
        <p>
         Welcome to Scunthorpe Live, the dedicated news, sport and what's on channel for all that's happening in Scunthorpe and North Lincolnshire. You can also follow Scunthorpe Live on
         <a href="https://www.facebook.com/scunthorpelive/" target="_blank">
          Facebook
         </a>
         and
         <a href="https://twitter.com/scunthorpelive?lang=en-gb" target="_blank">
          Twitter
         </a>
         Visit our
         <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe-united-1">
          Scunthorpe United
         </a>
         page for the latest on the Iron
        </p>
       </div>
       <time content="2018-07-29T10:31:12.000+0000" datetime="2018-07-29T10:31:12.000+0000" itemprop="dateModified">
        11:31, 29 JUL 2018
       </time>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders solo wide primary" data-group="topStories" data-group-index="0">
     <div class="teaser teaser-highlight teaser-prominent">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/man-suffers-knife-wound-scunthorpe-1838367">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/in-your-area/article1838401.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_scene.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/in-your-area/article1838401.ece/ALTERNATES/s508/0_scene.jpg 508w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/in-your-area/article1838401.ece/ALTERNATES/s540/0_scene.jpg 540w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner section-theme-border">
       <a class="label section-theme-highlight" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe">
        Scunthorpe
       </a>
       <a class="headline publication-font" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/man-suffers-knife-wound-scunthorpe-1838367">
        Man suffers knife wound in Scunthorpe town centre assault
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1838367">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/man-suffers-knife-wound-scunthorpe-1838367#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/man-suffers-knife-wound-scunthorpe-1838367">
        Humberside Police are appealing for information following the assault on Oswald Road this morning
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders duet primary" data-group="topStories" data-group-index="1">
     <div class="teaser">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/pub-plan-dropped-top-field-1835982">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1445628.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/Untitled-design-1.png" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1445628.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/Untitled-design-1.png 180w, https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1445628.ece/ALTERNATES/s390/Untitled-design-1.png 390w, https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1445628.ece/ALTERNATES/s458/Untitled-design-1.png 458w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
       <div class="video-icon section-theme-border section-theme">
       </div>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/barton">
        Barton
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/pub-plan-dropped-top-field-1835982">
        Pub plan dropped for Top Field site in North Lincolnshire - and here's what could replace it
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1835982">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/pub-plan-dropped-top-field-1835982#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/pub-plan-dropped-top-field-1835982">
        A family pub was planned for the site known as Top Field in Barton-Upon-Humber
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="teaser">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/scunthorpe-college-staff-member-takes-1831030">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1831038.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_Emma-T-Wing-Walk.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1831038.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/0_Emma-T-Wing-Walk.jpg 180w, https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1831038.ece/ALTERNATES/s390/0_Emma-T-Wing-Walk.jpg 390w, https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1831038.ece/ALTERNATES/s458/0_Emma-T-Wing-Walk.jpg 458w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe">
        Scunthorpe
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/scunthorpe-college-staff-member-takes-1831030">
        Scunthorpe college staff member takes part in wing walk to raise money for local Samaritans
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1831030">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/scunthorpe-college-staff-member-takes-1831030#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/scunthorpe-college-staff-member-takes-1831030">
        Emma Turner, from North Lindsey College in Scunthorpe, decided to help out the Scunthorpe Samaritans after learning about their fundraising efforts on professional social media platform LinkedIn
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="teaser">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/former-office-manager-estate-agent-1835453">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1835514.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_Untitled-design-23.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1835514.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/0_Untitled-design-23.jpg 180w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1835514.ece/ALTERNATES/s390/0_Untitled-design-23.jpg 390w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1835514.ece/ALTERNATES/s458/0_Untitled-design-23.jpg 458w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/courts">
        Courts
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/former-office-manager-estate-agent-1835453">
        Former office manager at estate agent conned employer out of £34,000
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1835453">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/former-office-manager-estate-agent-1835453#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/former-office-manager-estate-agent-1835453">
        Karen Blakey, 52, of Charles Lovell Way, Scunthorpe, pleaded guilty to four charges of fraud and three charges of false accountancy between 2012 and 2015
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="teaser">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/food-drink/worth-wait-try-out-newly-1835678">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1835714.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_IMG_0245.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1835714.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/0_IMG_0245.jpg 180w, https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1835714.ece/ALTERNATES/s390/0_IMG_0245.jpg 390w, https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1835714.ece/ALTERNATES/s458/0_IMG_0245.jpg 458w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/eating-out">
        Eating out
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/food-drink/worth-wait-try-out-newly-1835678">
        Worth the wait? We try out newly-opened Iron Forge pub and restaurant in Scunthorpe
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1835678">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/food-drink/worth-wait-try-out-newly-1835678#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/food-drink/worth-wait-try-out-newly-1835678">
        The Iron Forge pub opened on Wednesday at the site of the former Mallard pub on Burringham Road in Scunthorpe
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="teaser">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/see-pictures-michael-jackson-fans-1835937">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/article1835940.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_KingOfPop1.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/article1835940.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/0_KingOfPop1.jpg 180w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/article1835940.ece/ALTERNATES/s390/0_KingOfPop1.jpg 390w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/article1835940.ece/ALTERNATES/s458/0_KingOfPop1.jpg 458w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
       <div class="video-icon section-theme-border section-theme">
       </div>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/entertainment">
        Entertainment
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/see-pictures-michael-jackson-fans-1835937">
        See pictures of Michael Jackson fans at the King of Pop show at The Baths Hall in Scunthorpe
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1835937">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/see-pictures-michael-jackson-fans-1835937#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife/see-pictures-michael-jackson-fans-1835937">
        Some fans wore Michael Jackson fancy dress as the King of Pop show came to Scunthorpe
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="teaser">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/man-arrested-after-security-threat-1834562">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/article542711.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/9_scunthorpe-happy.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/article542711.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/9_scunthorpe-happy.jpg 180w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/article542711.ece/ALTERNATES/s390/9_scunthorpe-happy.jpg 390w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/article542711.ece/ALTERNATES/s458/9_scunthorpe-happy.jpg 458w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe">
        Scunthorpe
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/man-arrested-after-security-threat-1834562">
        Man arrested after security threat at Scunthorpe steelworks
       </a>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/man-arrested-after-security-threat-1834562">
        The site was closed yesterday morning (Thursday, July 26) following an incident which was believed to be a bomb scare
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders duet social secondary" data-group="featuredStories" data-group-index="0">
     <div class="teaser social">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/speed-camera-sites-north-lincolnshire-1835972">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1023383.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/van.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1023383.ece/ALTERNATES/s180/van.jpg 180w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1023383.ece/ALTERNATES/s390/van.jpg 390w, https://i2-prod.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/article1023383.ece/ALTERNATES/s458/van.jpg 458w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
       <div class="video-icon section-theme-border section-theme">
       </div>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/traffic-travel">
        Traffic &amp; Travel
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/speed-camera-sites-north-lincolnshire-1835972">
        Speed camera sites in North Lincolnshire for the week beginning July 30
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1835972">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/speed-camera-sites-north-lincolnshire-1835972#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/speed-camera-sites-north-lincolnshire-1835972">
        Mobile safety cameras operated by Safer Roads Humber are due to be used in these locations in Scunthorpe and North Lincolnshire between now and Sunday, August 5
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>

     <div class="teaser">

       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/locals-traders-give-reaction-new-1834588">

      <div class="inner">
       <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/north-lincolnshire-council">
        North Lincolnshire Council
       </a>
       <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/locals-traders-give-reaction-new-1834588">

       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1834588">

        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/news/local-news/locals-traders-give-reaction-new-1834588">

    <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders ensemble" data-group="sectionGroup1" data-group-index="0">
     <h3 class="publication-font">
      <a class="section-theme-indicator" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe-united-fc">
       Scunthorpe United
      </a>
     </h3>
     <div class="teaser teaser-highlight">
      <figure data-mod="image">
       <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/nick-daws-hopes-injured-scunthorpe-1837922">
        <img data-src="https://i2-prod.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk/incoming/article1837929.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_35840904.jpg" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
       </a>
      </figure>
      <div class="inner section-theme-border">
       <a class="label section-theme-highlight" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe-united-fc">
        Scunthorpe United FC
       </a>
       <a class="headline publication-font" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/nick-daws-hopes-injured-scunthorpe-1837922">
        Nick Daws hopes some of the injured Scunthorpe United players are close to returning
       </a>
       <div class="comments-count" data-mod="teaserCounter" data-streamid="grimsbytelegraph-1837922">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/nick-daws-hopes-injured-scunthorpe-1837922#comments-section">
         <span class="count-number">
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/nick-daws-hopes-injured-scunthorpe-1837922">
        The Scunthorpe United manager has given an update on the Iron's injured players
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="pancake duet secondary">
      <div class="teaser">
       <figure data-mod="image">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/scunthorpe-united-0-lincoln-city-1837571">

        </a>
       </figure>
       <div class="inner">
        <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe-united-fc">
         Scunthorpe United FC
        </a>
        <a class="headline" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/scunthorpe-united-0-lincoln-city-1837571">

        </a>

          <span class="count-number">

        </div>
        <a class="description" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/scunthorpe-united-0-lincoln-city-1837571">
         Scunthorpe United's pre-season campaign ended in defeat
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="teaser">
       <figure data-mod="image">
        <a href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/conor-townsend-moves-scunthorpe-united-1836755">

        </a>
       </figure>
       <div class="inner">
        <a class="label" href="https://www.grimsbytelegraph.co.uk/all-about/scunthorpe-united-fc">
         Scunthorpe United FC

        </a>

        </a>
